prompts.prompt: Do you want to invest $5,000 in high-risk stocks, $5,000 in mutual funds, or keep the money in your bank account?
Do you want to reinvest dividends in your mutual funds, buy more high-risk stocks, or cash out your investments to cover expenses?
Do you want to diversify your portfolio with international stocks, invest in an emerging market mutual fund, or purchase real estate stocks?
Do you want to invest in a tech startup, purchase government bonds, or invest in renewable energy mutual funds?
Do you want to invest in dividend-paying stocks, a balanced mutual fund, or cryptocurrency?
Do you want to invest in biotech stocks, socially responsible mutual funds, or real estate investment trusts (REITs)?
Do you want to invest in sustainable agriculture, corporate bonds, or venture capital funds?
Do you want to invest in artificial intelligence stocks, a global mutual fund, or treasury bonds?
Do you want to invest in health tech stocks, target-date funds, or municipal bonds?
Do you want to invest in renewable energy stocks, a low-risk mutual fund, or diversify into international bonds?
